title: Election Officials Brace for What Comes Next After Midterms
description: This is the first election in which a substantial number of candidates for major offices are election deniers or conspiracy theorists.
dc:creator: Michael Wines
media:credit: Kriston Jae Bethel for The New York Times
media:description: Voters in Jenkintown, Pa. Ballot issues are adding to the election-year static in a key swing state with one of the nationâ€™s tightest Senate races.
